name: Alien Run
description: A long way to victory lies ahead of you. Don’t forget about the obstacles which will try to stop you from succeeding. Jump, run, crouch, and move between three layers to stay up!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's impossible for me, I can't even beat the training. But it's a good game. NEVERMIND!  I figured out that there were levels.
